statements: DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND sensor_id = 5
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
DELETE FROM machinery WHERE machine_id IN (SELECT machine_id FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature')
DELETE FROM machinery WHERE machinery_name = 'Machine A';
DELETE FROM sensor_reading WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id IN (SELECT alert_id FROM alerts WHERE sensor_id = 2) AND timestamp < NOW();
DELETE FROM Machinery WHERE location = 'Factory A';
